title: WVU Today | Long to retire as WVU Tech campus president - WVU Today
content: WVU Today | Long to retire as WVU Tech campus president  WVU Today
description: After more than a decade of service to West Virginia University Institute of Technology, Campus President Carolyn Long announced her upcoming retirement during a Beckley Campus meeting held on Thursday, April 14. She plans to leave her post as campus president in December 2022.
